ifTrueActivities.name: Set DateRange to last month range

dependsOn.activity: If first day of the month

activities.name: If first day of the month

ifFalseActivities.name: Set dateFrom to first day of current month
Set dateTo to end of current month

ifTrueActivities.name: Set dateFrom to first day of last month
Set dateTo to last day of last month

dependsOn.activity: If first day of the month

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as long,
		name as string,
		countryShortName as string,
		region as string,
		firstVisited as string,
		company as boolean,
		ignored as boolean
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Visitors
Visitors filter(!isNull(id)) ~> FilteredVisitors
FilteredVisitors aggregate(groupBy(id),
	each(match(name!='id'), $$ = first($$))) ~> DedupedVisitors
DedupedVisitors sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['deduped_visitors.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DedupedVisitorCsv
